page.title: 12Religion in Eccleshall
page.content: There is a healthy attitude to rel- igion in Eccleshall, and congregations appear to be thriving. The{Anglican parish church of the Holy Trinity is an imposing red snadstone building. A modern vicarage and church room stand nearby. The vicar also ministers to the villages of Slindon and Offley Hay. The{Roman Catholic}church of the Sacred Heart has one priest in charge. There is a small convent attached. Associated with the convent is Broughton Hall, near Eccleshall, which is run by the Sisters and used as a rest home. A brick-built Methodist church in Stone Road has a community room attached. The minister also serves the villages of Gnosall, Woods- eaves and Bishop's Offley. A great deal of community work is done by all three churches.
